Class PDFNumsArray

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.fop.pdf.PDFObject

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PDFWritable

    public class PDFNumsArray
extends PDFObject
    Class representing an "Nums" array object (for Number Trees).
